description: Episode of Series "Treasures from the American Film Archives: 50 preserved films (DVD)". The program notes to the four-disk DVD set; 150 page book containing the full credits, transcribed commentary, detailed information on each film including preservation and soundtrack notes. Notes on the music by Martin Marks. Further information: www.filmpreservation.org.
